item.title: [PI] How to access and clear the music tab
item.dc:creator: @l0lc0pt3r l0lc0pt3r
item.description:
@l0lc0pt3r wrote:

[quote=“ChaosPkers, post:16, topic:452566”][quote author=l0lc0pt3r link=topic=555444.msg4070343#msg4070343 date=1344288500]
Leeched from R-L, was googling how to remove the Crush +2 in quest tab ran across this, and an identical post from a few months back…

date tag from R-L “April 28th, 2012, 11:37”

and heres a link if anyone wants to double check
http://www.r-locus.com/forums/showthread.php?73377-PI-How-to-access-and-clear-the-music-tab

:l
[/quote]
Maybe he’s just sharing it for people who don’t use RL?[/quote]

never said he wasn’t? just saying its not his work :l

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] How to access and clear the music tab
item.dc:creator: @Tr7 Tr7
item.description:
@Tr7 wrote:

You were supposed to comment out the “case 1675: sendFrame126(str, 17508); break;//stab” stuff like so:

//case 1675: sendFrame126(str, 17508); break;//Stab
//case 1676: sendFrame126(str, 17509); break;//Slash
//case 1677: sendFrame126(str, 17510); break;//Cursh
//case 1678: sendFrame126(str, 17511); break;//Magic
//case 1679: sendFrame126(str, 17512); break;//Range
//case 1680: sendFrame126(str, 17513); break;//Stab
//case 1681: sendFrame126(str, 17514); break;//Slash
//case 1682: sendFrame126(str, 17515); break;//Crush
//case 1683: sendFrame126(str, 17516); break;//Magic
//case 1684: sendFrame126(str, 17517); break;//Range
//case 1686: sendFrame126(str, 17518); break;//Strength
//case 1687: sendFrame126(str, 17519); break;//Prayer

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] How to access and clear the music tab
item.dc:creator: @cedrick cedrick
item.description:
@cedrick wrote:

How to ACCESS and CLEAR the Music Tab

Making the Music Tab visible:

By default on a Project Insanity base the music tab is hidden. So the first thing we need to do is to find the music tab and make it active. To do this just follow the instructions below

[Server-Sided] Open Client.Java

Search for:

Now replace that line of code with:

Removing the list of songs from the music tab:

Now that you have made the music tab accessible to people with your NEW client you need to clear all of the songs within the tab. This will allow you to make (for example) a donator tab where only donators can purchase items from it!

[Client-Sided] Open client.Java

Search for:

Now replace the whole of this:

case 1675: sendFrame126(str, 17508); break;//Stab case 1676: sendFrame126(str, 17509); break;//Slash case 1677: sendFrame126(str, 17510); break;//Cursh case 1678: sendFrame126(str, 17511); break;//Magic case 1679: sendFrame126(str, 17512); break;//Range case 1680: sendFrame126(str, 17513); break;//Stab case 1681: sendFrame126(str, 17514); break;//Slash case 1682: sendFrame126(str, 17515); break;//Crush case 1683: sendFrame126(str, 17516); break;//Magic case 1684: sendFrame126(str, 17517); break;//Range case 1686: sendFrame126(str, 17518); break;//Strength case 1687: sendFrame126(str, 17519); break;//Prayer

With this (all you are doing is adding // to the start of each line, but I have made it so you can copy and paste it ):

//case 1675: sendFrame126(str, 17508); break;//Stab //case 1676: sendFrame126(str, 17509); break;//Slash //case 1677: sendFrame126(str, 17510); break;//Cursh //case 1678: sendFrame126(str, 17511); break;//Magic //case 1679: sendFrame126(str, 17512); break;//Range //case 1680: sendFrame126(str, 17513); break;//Stab //case 1681: sendFrame126(str, 17514); break;//Slash //case 1682: sendFrame126(str, 17515); break;//Crush //case 1683: sendFrame126(str, 17516); break;//Magic //case 1684: sendFrame126(str, 17517); break;//Range //case 1686: sendFrame126(str, 17518); break;//Strength //case 1687: sendFrame126(str, 17519); break;//Prayer

Explanation: I don’t know why but if you do not follow the steps I have given above then in your quest tab you will have crush: +2 (depends what you are wearing) and you will also get similar problems in the music tab. So if you just comment out that section that I have provided for you then it just removes it I have no idea why it was added in the first place to PI!

[Server-Sided] Open PlayerAssistant.Java

Search for:

Underneath that line of code copy and paste the following:

// CLEARING THE MUSIC TAB BY CEDRICK c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 18275); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 15493); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 11941); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 4287); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 4288); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 4289); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 4290); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 4291); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 4292); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 4293); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 4294); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 4295); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 4296); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 4297); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 4298); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 4299); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 4300); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 4301); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 4302); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 4303); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 4304); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 4305); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 4306); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 4307); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 4308); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 4309); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 4310); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 4311); c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 4312); I understand that this is very easy to do But finding the ID numbers of each line in the music tab took me 2 hours, so I thought i’d save people sometime Have fun guys!

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How to access and clear the music tab
